paragraphs.Education1: I am a seventh-semester student at the Polish-Japanese Academy of Information Technology, majoring in Computer Science.
paragraphs.Education2: I began my studies in 2022 and have learned a lot over the past few years. The university has provided me with a solid foundation in software development, and I have many skill areas ready to be further developed through practical experience. During my studies, I completed several interesting courses and engaging projects, and I learned how to collaborate effectively in software design and development teams.
paragraphs.Experience1: Although I do not have direct experience in commercial software development, over the past few years I have taken on various non-software roles, including working as a technician for audio-video conferences, in fast food restaurants, and tutoring math and programming.
paragraphs.Experience2: Most of my software experience comes from academic projects and assignments.
paragraphs.Skills1: Most of my programming skills are listed on the home page, and I am also showcasing them here.
paragraphs.Interests1: I enjoy spending my time actively. I have been climbing regularly for about six months, and I also enjoy mountain hiking.
paragraphs.Interests2: However, my longest-cultivated passion is music, particularly playing the guitar.
